attributes.action: Tax imports from countries not actively working to meet carbon emissions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the PM's agreement that the UK's carbon emissions are only 2% of global emissions and stating that if the UK stopped all emissions it would only take China 15 months to make up the difference.  I would petition the PM to start taxing imports on countries not actively trying to meet emissions targets instead of trying to raise revenue by imposing an undeserved green tax on the UK public.
